original_title: HRCSL to investigate delay in LG Election
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka's Human Rights Commission said it would be conducting a special investigation over the delay in conducting the Local Government Election.
A spokesperson said that several complaints have been filed with the HRCSL over the matter, and thus an investigation will be carried out.
The spokesperson said that members of the National Election Commission would be summoned to inquire in to the matter.
However, the National Election Commission had told the HRCSL that due to an ongoing legal matter, a separate date was requested to be present at HRCSL.
